mapper.insert: insert into board(member_no, category, title, writer, content, write_date, start_date, end_date) values(#{memberNo}, #{category}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, default, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: update board set category=#{category}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate} where board_no=#{boardNo}
